metadata.dc:subject: TUBERCULOSIS, MENINGEAL/in infant and child
ELECTROENCEPHALOGRAPHY
STREPTOMYCIN/therapeutic use
metadata.dc:title: La electroencefalografäa en el curso de la meningitis bacilar en el niño; su aporte al tratamiento moderno estreptomicinico y quirúrgico, estudio de 31 casos.
[Electroencephalography in tuberculous meningitis in children; relation to streptomycin and surgical therapies, report of 31 cases].
